record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Let Mon Lee, a fellow from the U.S. Corps of Engineers, be allowed floor privileges for the duration of the Senate's consideration of the Water Resources Development Act.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that Mike Quiello of my staff be granted the privileges of the floor for the duration of the debate on WRDA.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Mike Burke, a fellow in my office, be accorded the privileges of the floor for the duration of H.R. 1495.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
